exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma 'Microsoft Yahei'"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma 'Microsoft Yahei'"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="radiobutton_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="radiobutton_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="radiobutton_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="radiobutton_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="on_png"
             source.up="off_png"
             source.down="off_png"
             source.disabled="off_png"/>
    <e:Image source="handle_png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PanelLoadingSkin" width="640" height="960" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group id="cirGroup" height="70" width="76" y="477" x="320">
		<e:Image source="loading_panel_png" x="-44" y="-44" locked="true"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Label id="loadTF" text="Loading" size="20" horizontalCenter="0" textAlign="center" verticalCenter="0" verticalAlign="middle"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PreloadingSkin" width="640" height="960" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group id="sCir1" width="33" height="35" x="320" y="362">
		<e:Image source="scir_png" x="-17" y="-17" locked="true"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="sCir2" width="45" height="45" x="320" y="431">
		<e:Image source="scir_png" y="-17" x="-17"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Rect id="pBg" width="400" height="2" y="446" fillColor="0xFFFFFF" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Rect id="pFront" y="446" width="400" height="2" fillColor="0x49DC0F" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Label id="pTF" text="0%" y="455" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Group id="logo" width="53" height="53" x="320" y="445">
		<e:Image source="logo_15c_png" x="-75" y="-113" locked="true"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="leaf" width="89" height="86" x="400" y="955" rotation="-10">
		<e:Image source="leaf_10c_png" x="-251" y="-517" locked="true"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="SceneLoadingSkin" width="640" height="960" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect id="bg" fillColor="0x1EF7E8" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Rect id="pBg" width="400" height="2" y="446" fillColor="0xFFFFFF" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Rect id="pFront" y="446" width="400" height="2" horizontalCenter="0" fillColor="0x38A40A"/>
	<e:Label id="pTF" text="0%" y="453" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Group id="logo" width="53" height="53" x="320" y="445">
		<e:Image source="logo_15c_png" x="-75" y="-113" locked="true"/>
	</e:Group>
	</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="LoginSceneSkin" width="640" height="960" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Image source="login_bg_jpg"/>
	<e:Button id="loginBtn" label="登陆" width="132" height="70" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="177">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="login_btn_png"/>
				<e:Label text="登陆" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="BuildingButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%"    source.disabled="btn_building_gray_png" source="btn_yellow_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay"
	         size="28" fontFamily="Tahoma 'Microsoft Yahei'"
	         textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" width="100" height="25" verticalCenter="-1" horizontalCenter="0" text="x1000"/>
	</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="MenuButtonSkin"
        states="up,down,disabled"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image x="2" y="3" source="menu_bg_png"/>
	<e:Image id="iconDisplay" source="menu_build_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="lightSp" x="0" y="0" source="menu_ef_png" visible="false"  visible.disabled="true"/>
	</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="NumberTabItemButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%"    source="tab2_png" source.disabled="tab2_select_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay"
	         size="28" fontFamily="Tahoma 'Microsoft Yahei'"
	         textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" width="100" height="25" verticalCenter="-1" horizontalCenter="0" text="x1000"/>
	</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="TypeTabItemButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%"    source="tab1_png" source.disabled="tab1_select_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay"
	         size="28" fontFamily="Tahoma 'Microsoft Yahei'"
	         textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" width="100" height="25" verticalCenter="-1" horizontalCenter="0" text="建筑"/>
	</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="CostResItemSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Label id="numTF" text="-2050.3K" size="20" verticalCenter="0.5" right="32" textAlign="right" verticalAlign="middle"/>
	<e:Image id="icon" source="res_icon_103_png" y="1" width="26" height="26" right="2"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="FirstResItemSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="top_input_png" scale9Grid="17,15,14,3" width="200" x="0" height="47" y="0"/>
	<e:Image id="icon" source="res_icon_1_png" x="4" y="3"/>
	<e:Label id="nameTF" text="食物" x="46" y="5" size="20"/>
	<e:Label id="addNumTF" size="20" y="4" text="＋12536/s" right="9" textColor="0x4CD00A"/>
	<e:Label id="numTF" size="20" y="24" text="1020000" right="9"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="SecondResItemSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="top_input_png" width="305" x="0" height="35" y="0" scale9Grid="17,10,16,15"/>
	<e:Image id="icon" x="4" source="res_icon_5_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Label id="nameTF" text="食物" x="46" size="20" y="8"/>
	<e:Label id="numTF" size="20" text="1020000" right="9" y="8"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ThirdResItemSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="top_input_png" width="200" x="0" height="35" y="0" scale9Grid="17,10,16,15"/>
	<e:Image id="icon" x="4" verticalCenter="0"  source="res_icon_10_png"/>
	<e:Label id="nameTF" text="食物" x="46" size="20" y="8"/>
	<e:Label id="numTF" size="20" text="1020000" right="9" y="8"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="MainSceneSkin" width="640" height="960" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="pic_background_jpg" locked="true"/>
	<e:Group id="bottomGroup" width="640" height="98" y="862">
		<e:Image x="2" bottom="0" locked="true" source="menu_dinfo_png"/>
		<e:Button id="btnHome" label="按钮" skinName="MenuButtonSkin" horizontalCenter="-269" verticalCenter="6"/>
		<e:Button id="btnBuilding" label="按钮" skinName="MenuButtonSkin" horizontalCenter="-179" verticalCenter="6"/>
		<e:Button id="btnTechnology" label="按钮" skinName="MenuButtonSkin" horizontalCenter="-89" verticalCenter="6"/>
		<e:Button id="btnCamp" label="按钮" skinName="MenuButtonSkin" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="6"/>
		<e:Button id="btnAlliance" label="按钮" skinName="MenuButtonSkin" horizontalCenter="90" verticalCenter="6"/>
		<e:Button id="btnShop" label="按钮" skinName="MenuButtonSkin" horizontalCenter="180" verticalCenter="6"/>
		<e:Button id="btnSetting" label="按钮" skinName="MenuButtonSkin" horizontalCenter="270" verticalCenter="6"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="topGroup" width="640" height="200">
		<e:Rect left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" fillColor="0x172431"/>
		
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="FactoryBuildingItemSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" width="640">
	<e:Image source="item_bg_png" scale9Grid="12,32,7,22" width="350" x="143" y="11"/>
	<e:Label id="nameTF" text="铁匠铺" x="149" y="14" size="20"/>
	<e:Label id="descTF" size="18" y="41" text="食物生产速度" x="149" textColor="0xF3EFEF"/>
	<e:Label id="lvTF" size="20" y="40" textColor="0xF3EFEF" text="Lv.1000" right="157"/>
	<e:Label id="effectDescTF" size="18" y="16" text="将石头转成金属(10转1)" right="154" textColor="0xFFFF22"/>
	<e:Image id="icon" x="45" y="-1" source="building_icon_104_png"/>
	<e:Button id="buildBtn" label="+1" skinName="BuildingButtonSkin" horizontalCenter="234" verticalCenter="-0.5">
	</e:Button>
	<e:Group id="costGroup" width="324" height="26" x="152" y="60">
	</e:Group>
	<e:Label id="effectTF" y="40" textColor="0x74DB00" text="100/s" size="20" x="268"/>
	<e:ToggleButton id="openBtn" label="切换按钮" x="12" verticalCenter="0.5">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="factory_bar_on_png" 
				         source.upAndSelected="factory_bar_off_png" 
				         source.downAndSelected="factory_bar_off_png" 
				         source.disabledAndSelected="factory_bar_off_png" 
				         />
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:ToggleButton>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ResBuildingItemSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" width="640">
	<e:Image source="item_bg_png" scale9Grid="12,32,7,22" width="350" x="143" y="11"/>
	<e:Label id="nameTF" text="农场" x="149" y="14" size="20"/>
	<e:Label id="descTF" size="18" y="41" text="食物生产速度" x="149" textColor="0xF3EFEF"/>
	<e:Label id="lvTF" size="20" y="40" textColor="0xF3EFEF" text="Lv.1000" right="157"/>
	<e:Label id="effectTF" size="20" y="39" text="100/s" x="265" textColor="0x74DB00"/>
	<e:Image id="icon" source="building_icon_101_png" x="44" y="-1"/>
	<e:Button id="buildBtn" label="+1" skinName="BuildingButtonSkin" horizontalCenter="234" verticalCenter="-0.5">
	</e:Button>
	<e:Group id="costGroup" width="324" height="26" x="153" y="60"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="StoreBuildingItemSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" width="640">
	<e:Image source="item_bg_png" scale9Grid="12,32,7,22" width="350" x="143" y="11"/>
	<e:Label id="nameTF" text="谷仓" x="149" y="14" size="20"/>
	<e:Label id="descTF" size="18" y="41" text="食物生产速度" x="149" textColor="0xF3EFEF"/>
	<e:Label id="lvTF" size="20" y="40" textColor="0xF3EFEF" text="Lv.1000" right="157"/>
	<e:Label id="effectTF" size="20" y="14" text="食物上限：12358.0K" textColor="0x74DB00" right="157"/>
	<e:Image id="icon" x="44" y="-1" source="building_icon_104_png"/>
	<e:Button id="buildBtn" label="+1" skinName="BuildingButtonSkin" horizontalCenter="234" verticalCenter="-0.5">
	</e:Button>
	<e:Group id="costGroup" width="324" height="26" x="153" y="60"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="WarBuildingItemSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" width="640">
	<e:Image source="item_bg_png" scale9Grid="12,32,7,22" width="350" x="143" y="11"/>
	<e:Label id="nameTF" text="农场" x="149" y="14" size="20"/>
	<e:Label id="descTF" size="18" y="41" text="食物生产速度" x="149" textColor="0xF3EFEF"/>
	<e:Label id="lvTF" size="20" y="40" textColor="0xF3EFEF" text="Lv.1000" right="157"/>
	<e:Image id="icon" x="44" y="-1" source="building_icon_114_png"/>
	<e:Button id="buildBtn" label="+1" skinName="BuildingButtonSkin" horizontalCenter="234" verticalCenter="-0.5">
	</e:Button>
	<e:Group id="costGroup" width="324" height="26" x="153" y="60"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ClickResPanelSkin" width="640" height="545" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Button id="btnFood" label="按钮" horizontalCenter="4" verticalCenter="-114.5">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="bigapple_png"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="btnStone" label="按钮" verticalCenter="132.5" horizontalCenter="-131">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="bigstone_png"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="btnWood" label="按钮" horizontalCenter="167" verticalCenter="132.5">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="bigwood_png"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>
